## Slots

| Slot            | Description                |
| --------------- | -------------------------- |
| `"back-button"` | Content of the back button |
| `"next-button"` | Content of the next button |

| Part            | Description         |
| --------------- | ------------------- |
| `"back-button"` | The back button     |
| `"list"`        | The list of buttons |
| `"next-button"` | The next button     |
| `"page-button"` | The page button     |
